title: Archive: England v Scotland - Euro 1996
body_text:
Archive: England v Scotland - Euro 1996
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
Relive England's victory over Scotland at Euro 1996 with Paul Gascoigne taking a starring role amid much criticism of his place in the team.
Watch Euros Rewind: England v Scotland from Euro 1996 in full on BBC iPlayer.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
